project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying mean, median, and mode for numerical columns of a CSV file, as specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to load a CSV file
Implement feature to allow user to specify numerical columns for analysis
Calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Calculate median for specified numerical columns
Calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Display results (mean, median, mode) to the user
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness
